Nitta Gate Pass

{{doc.name}}


Date:Of Dispatch:{{doc.from_date}}

Vendor Details

Name : {{doc.vendor}}
Email : {{doc.vendor_email}}
Contact Number : {{doc.vendor_contact}}

Material Details

{% for d in doc.item %} {% endfor %}
Material Work To be done Quantity Expected Delivery Date
{{d.pdt_name}} {{d.work_to_be_done}} {{d.quantity}} {{d.expected_delivery_date}}

Way of Dispatch

Type :{{doc.way_of_dispatch}}
{% if doc.way_of_dispatch == "By Hand" %}

Recipient Details

Recipient Name {{ doc.recipient }}
Contact Number {{ doc.phone }}
{% elif doc.way_of_dispatch == "Courier" %}

Courier Details

Courier Company {{ doc.courier_company }}
Courier Tracking Number {{ doc.courier_number }}
{% elif doc.way_of_dispatch == "Vehicle" %}

Driver&Vehicle Details

Driver Name {{ doc.driver_name }}
Contact Number {{ doc.contact_number }}
Registration Number {{ doc.registration_number }}
{% endif %}
